Name: Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon based)
Ingredients: 5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Bourbon's sweet notes are lifted and amplified by amaretto's almond flavours. For a slightly drier, more complex version of this cocktail, try a Toasted Almond Old Fashioned .
History: See history of the Old-Fashioned cocktail .
